content: get ready to create a cozy and charming heart filled square crochet afghan block with this easy-to-follow pattern perfect for beginners this seamless square pattern is ready for your next project featuring a classic granny stitch motif the written pattern is accompanied by a helpful video tutorial for extra guidance **unique features-** easy-to-follow written pattern for beginners seamless construction for a polished finish classic granny square motif for a timeless look accompanying video tutorial for visual learners **materials needed-** hook 6mm us size 10 0 yarn red heart with love https //amzn to/45upymn solids aran weight 100-150 yards
